sections.title: Smartphones
sections.body: Packed with entertainment and powered by Android, Sony's Xperia™ smartphones are fast and reliable; tough as well as beautiful. With all the clarity and performance you'd expect from Sony - advanced screen technology and cameras as good as the best Sony compacts. The majority come with one-touch NFC, so sharing your world has never been easier.

sections.title: Tablets
sections.body: We've built the best of Sony into our Xperia™ tablets. So get ready for uncompromising speed and sound, stunning images and truly immersive viewing and gaming. They're bursting with entertainment opportunities, and ready for one-touch connection with your TV and other devices. Of course, with all the strength and style you'd expect from Sony.

sections.title: Accessories
sections.body: Empower your mobile life. From head-sets to SmartWatch, tablet stands to charging docks, Sony's accessories let you do a little bit more.

sections.title: Cool stuff
sections.body: Welcome to Sony Xperia™ family! We want you to get the most from your new smartphone or tablet, and here's some cool stuff that will help. Xperia™ Transfer and Xperia™ Care will get you up and running fast. Plug in to Sony Entertainment Network, or try-out Xperia™ Lounge for exclusive offers and promotions.

services.title: Sony select
services.description: Need a few tips on which apps to download from Google Play Store? Let Sony Select show you the best of the bunch.

services.title: TV sideview
services.description: Enjoy TV more. Get details on the programme you are watching, find content across various services or devices and operate your TV easily with your Xperia™ Tablet.

services.title: Playstation mobile
services.description: Make the most of PlayStation® style gaming on the Xperia™ Tablet Z by using the on-screen virtual DUALSHOCK controller to play your favourite games.

services.title: Movies
services.description: Be entertained. Enjoy your favourite movies and TV shows with high picture and sound quality and the option to "throw" it to your DLNA enabled TV.

services.title: Walkman
services.description: Play, recommend, discover and experience songs in soul shaking clarity thanks to Sony's Clear Audio+ mode.

services.title: Social live
services.description: Discover your favourite news, videos and social networking feeds in one place.
